headline: Assessing Monster Beverage (MNST) Valuation After Strong One Year And 90 Day Share Price Returns
summary: Monster Beverage (MNST) has returned to investors’ attention after its recent trading performance, with the stock closing at US$84.69 as returns over the past year and past 3 months draw interest. See our latest analysis for Monster Beverage. The recent 1-day share price return of 1.11% and 90-day share price return of 13.19% suggest momentum has been building, while the 1-year total shareholder return of 61.13% highlights how strong the overall payoff has been over a longer period.
